title: Manfred Klein on Font-mania
content:
Manfred sent me some photos, and I thought it would be fun to combine it with the **[FONT](http://web.archive.org/web/20061116090732/http:/moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/klein06/deco01/bradbury_obl.htm)** he released this week, and a quote from **[HIS INTERVIEW](http://web.archive.org/web/20061116090732/http:/moorstation.org/typoasis/tbp/talks/manfred/intro.htm)**

 ![](http://web.archive.org/files/bradburyobli.jpg)
author: fontplayer

comments.content:
I fixed it. Working too fast as usual.

PS, Manfred has been one of my guest photographers for some time. His photos can be seen **[HERE](http://web.archive.org/web/20061116090732/http:/www.fontplay.com/freephotos/manfred.htm)**
